GSD.description:
video: fbdev: sm712fb: Fix crash in smtcfb_write()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 809b8cde86320698661eec677222bc5c5df76176. For more details please see the references link.
